alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Cherokee; Ida; Plymouth; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 4:05PM CST until December 15 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cherokee County in northwestern Iowa... Eastern Woodbury County in west central Iowa... Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... Southwestern Buena Vista County in northwestern Iowa... Ida County in west central Iowa... * Until 500 PM CST. * At 403 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Allen to near Winnebago to 8 miles northeast of Craig, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Kingsley, Smithland, Merrill and Pierson around 430 PM CST. Danbury, Washta and Craig around 440 PM CST. Le Mars, Battle Creek, Quimby and Struble around 445 PM CST. Ida Grove, Cleghorn and Cushing around 450 PM CST. Cherokee and Holstein around 455 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Oyens, Oto, Brunsville, Meriden, Westfield and Chatsworth. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northwestern and west central Iowa...and southeastern South Dakota. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across parts of Nebraska. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northwestern and west central Iowa...and southeastern South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Buena Vista; Cherokee; Ida; Plymouth; Woodbury
